Sensors: ECG, SpO2, Temp, Depth Gauge, Siren
Description: Apple's most rugged and capable smartwatch ever created. Designed for extreme outdoor adventures, endurance athletes, and serious divers. The stunning 3000-nit display remains visible even in direct sunlight, perfect for mountain climbers and hikers. Whether you're training for a triathlon, exploring backcountry trails, or diving in open water, this watch is your ultimate companion for adventure and performance.

Description: Revolutionary screen-less fitness tracker that focuses purely on what matters - your body's recovery, strain, and readiness. This minimalist band provides zero distractions while delivering the most comprehensive recovery insights available. The advanced algorithm analyzes heart rate variability (HRV), resting heart rate, respiratory rate, and skin temperature to calculate your Recovery Score (0-100%) and Strain Score, helping you understand exactly when to push hard and when to rest. Detailed sleep analysis breaks down your sleep stages and provides insights to improve rest quality. The sleek, screen-less design ensures comfortable 24/7 wear without notifications or distractions. IP68 water resistance means you can wear it swimming and showering. Requires a subscription for full features. Perfect for data-driven athletes who want detailed recovery insights, professional athletes optimizing performance, individuals focused on sleep and recovery optimization, users who want minimal distractions, and anyone who prioritizes understanding their body's readiness over having a screen on their wrist.
